scripts.build: npm run v1-build && npm run v2-build
scripts.v1-build: npx rimraf build/texscript/v1 && npx webpack --config scripts/v1/webpack.config.js --env outputDir=build mode=production
scripts.v1-build-dev: npx rimraf build/texscript/v1 && npx webpack --config scripts/v1/webpack.config.js
scripts.v1-preview: npm run v1-build && npx http-server build --port=80
scripts.v2-build: npx rimraf build/texscript/v2 && npx webpack --config scripts/v2/webpack.config.js --env outputDir=build mode=production
scripts.v2-build-dev: npx rimraf build/texscript/v2 && npx webpack --config scripts/v2/webpack.config.js
scripts.v2-preview: npm run v2-build && npx http-server build --port=80
